attributes.action: End Foreign travel for MP's, when it is blatantly obvious that it is a holiday.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to End Foreign travel for MP's,
when it is blatantly obvious that it is a holiday.

It is very apparent that over recent years MP's have been taking Foreign Holidays in the guise of attending this or that conference on something or other, as an example John Prescott did this only last year look up his travel and you will see, and all this at Tax payers expense.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
